issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The test case testInsertOverwriteForPartitionedMmTable in TestTxnCommandsForMmTable.java and TestTxnCommandsForOrcMmTable.java fails with a java.lang.AssertionError on ppc arch.

Maven command used is mvn -Dtest=TestTxnCommandsForMmTable test

The test case fails as the listStatus function of the FileSystem does not guarantee to return the List of files/directories status in a sorted order.

Error :
{code:java}
[INFO] Running org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.TestTxnCommandsForMmTable
[ERROR] Tests run: 7, Failures: 1, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 125.463 s <<< FAILURE! - in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.TestTxnCommandsForMmTable
[ERROR] testInsertOverwriteForPartitionedMmTable(org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.TestTxnCommandsForMmTable)  Time elapsed: 13.57 s  <<< FAILURE!
java.lang.AssertionError
        at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:86)
        at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41)
        at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:52)
        at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.TestTxnCommandsForMmTable.testInsertOverwriteForPartitionedMmTable(TestTxnCommandsForMmTable.java:296)
{code}
fields.summary: Test case in Hive Query Language fails with a java.lang.AssertionError.
fields.environment:
uname -a
Linux pts00607-vm3 4.4.0-112-generic #135-Ubuntu SMP Fri Jan 19 11:48:46 UTC 2018 ppc64le ppc64le ppc64le GNU/Linux

comments.body: FYI, [~steveyeom2017]
Hi [~steveyeom2017], thanks for the update. I am looking forward to a possible solution for the above issue.
Hi [~steveyeom2017], just a quick reminder for your reply on the above issue. Thank you.

Hi [~steveyeom2017],

Could you please review the above patch ?
 There's a small change that I have introduced in the patch i.e. have sorted the FileStatus array object as, the listStatus function of the FileSystem does not guarantee to return the List of files/directories status in a sorted order.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12923241 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
+1 for the patch on the condition that it works (passed p-tests) without any regression.
Thanks for the review [~steveyeom2017]. Looking forward to see the patch upstreamed.
Hi [~steveyeom2017], can someone from the community merge the patch available ?

Hi [~prasanth_j] can you help me merge the patch? 
Thank you, 
Steve.
HiveQA have not +1'ed the patch yet (there are some test failures in the last run). can you re-upload the patch with different version so that precommit tests run again?

OK. I have submitted the same patch with a different version suffix. 
We can check the results.

Hi Prasanth Jayachandran I think we got a green test run. can you help me merge the patch? 
Thanks, 
Steve.
[~steveyeom2017] is this master only patch or should it also go into branch-3?

It is master only 
Thanks, 
Steve.
Committed to master. Thanks [~alishap] for the patch and [~steveyeom2017] for the review!
